name: Pseudodragon
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can\'t speak

traits.Keen Senses: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.
traits.Limited Telepathy: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.
traits.Magic Resistance: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
